named-query.name: RANCHER_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a single rancher by rancherId
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Rancher r WHERE r.rancherId = :rancherId

named-query.name: ALL_RANCHERS
named-query.description: Get all ranchers in database
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Rancher r ORDER BY r.lastName, r.motherName, r.firstName, r.rancherId

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_RANCHER_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a single enterprise rancher by enterpriseId
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise WHERE enterprise.enterpriseId = :enterpriseId

named-query.name: ALL_ENTERPRISE_RANCHERS
named-query.description: Get all enterprise ranchers in database
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise ORDER BY enterprise.legalName, enterprise.legalId, enterprise.state

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_RANCHER_BY_RFC
named-query.description: Get a single enterprise rancher record by legal_id
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise WHERE enterprise.legalId = :rfc

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_RANCHER_BY_LEGAL_NAME
named-query.description: Get a single enterprise rancher record by legal_name
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise WHERE enterprise.legalName = :legalName

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoice record using it's id
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.rancherInvoiceId = :rancherInvoiceId

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_RANCHER_ID
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoice record using the rancherId
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.rancherId = :rancherId

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_RFC
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoicing record by legal_id
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.legalId = :rfc

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_LEGAL_NAME
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoicing record by legal_name
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.legalName = :legalName

named-query.name: RANCHER_CONTACT_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a rancher contact by its contact Id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM RancherContact contact WHERE contact.contactId = :contactId

named-query.name: RANCHER_CONTACT_BY_RANCHER_ID
named-query.description: Get all rancher contacts by rancher id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM RancherContact contact WHERE contact.rancherId = :rancherId ORDER BY contact.firstName, contact.lastName, contact.motherName

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_CONTACT_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get an enterprise contact by its contact id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM EnterpriseContact contact WHERE contact.contactId = :contactId

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_CONTACT_BY_ENTERPRISE_ID
named-query.description: Get all enterprise contact by enterprise id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM EnterpriseContact contact WHERE contact.enterpriseId = :enterpriseId ORDER BY contact.firstName, contact.lastName, contact.motherName

named-query.name: CATTLE_CLASS_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single cattle class record by it's ID
named-query.query: SELECT cattle FROM CattleClass cattle WHERE cattle.catclassId = :catclassId

named-query.name: ALL_CATTLE_CLASSES
named-query.description: Retrieves all cattle class records from database
named-query.query: SELECT cattle FROM CattleClass cattle ORDER BY cattle.catclassName

named-query.name: ALL_CATTLE_TYPE
named-query.description: Retrieves all cattle type records from database
named-query.query: SELECT Cattle FROM CattleType Cattle ORDER BY Cattle.cattypeName

named-query.name: CATTLE_TYPE_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve a single cattle type record using the type id
named-query.query: SELECT Cattle FROM CattleType Cattle WHERE Cattle.cattypeId= :cattypeId

named-query.name: CATTLE_TYPE_BY_CLASS_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve the cattle types associated with a cattle class
named-query.query: SELECT Cattle FROM CattleType Cattle WHERE Cattle.catclassId = :catClassId

named-query.name: CAT_LOCATION_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single catLocation record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT loc FROM Location loc WHERE loc.locationId = :locationId

named-query.name: ALL_CAT_LOCATION
named-query.description: Retrieves all catalog location records from database
named-query.query: SELECT loc FROM Location loc ORDER BY loc.locationName

named-query.name: BARNYARD_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single catBarnyard record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT bar FROM Barnyard bar WHERE bar.barnyardId = :barnyardId

named-query.name: BARNYARD_BY_LOCATION
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of barnyards given its location id
named-query.query: SELECT barn FROM Barnyard barn WHERE barn.locationId = :locationId ORDER BY barn.barnyardCode

named-query.name: ALL_BARNYARDS
named-query.description: Retrieves all barnyard records from database.
named-query.query: SELECT barn FROM Barnyard barn ORDER BY barn.barnyardCode

named-query.name: BARNYARD_CAPACITY_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single catBarnyardCapacity record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT barCa FROM BarnyardCapacity barCa WHERE barCa.capacityId = :capacityId

named-query.name: BARNYARD_CAPACITY_BY_BARNYARD_AND_CATTLE
named-query.description: Retrieves a single barnyard capacity record using the barnyard and the cattle
named-query.query: SELECT capacity FROM BarnyardCapacity capacity WHERE capacity.barnyardId = :barnyardId AND capacity.catclassId = :cattleClassId

named-query.name: ALL_BARNYARD_CAPACITIES
named-query.description: Get all records of barnyard capacities in database
named-query.query: SELECT barCa FROM BarnyardCapacity barCa ORDER BY barCa.barnyardId

named-query.name: CAT_MEASUREMENTUNIT_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single catMeasurementUnit record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT MeaUni FROM MeasurementUnit MeaUni WHERE MeaUni.unitId = :unitId

named-query.name: ALL_MEASUREMENT_UNITS
named-query.description: Retrieves all measurement units from database.
named-query.query: SELECT mu FROM MeasurementUnit mu ORDER BY mu.unitAbreviation

named-query.name: CAT_MEASUREMENTUNITEQUIVALENCE_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single catMeasurementUnitEquivalence record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT MeaUnEq FROM MeasurementUnitEquivalence MeaUnEq WHERE MeaUnEq.equivalenceId = :equivalenceId

named-query.name: EQUIVALENCE_BY_UNIT_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves the equivalence of a given unit id
named-query.query: SELECT equivalence FROM MeasurementUnitEquivalence equivalence WHERE equivalence.unitSrc = :unitId

named-query.name: CRT_RECEPTION_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtReception record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT Recep FROM Reception Recep WHERE Recep.receptionId = :receptionId

named-query.name: ALL_RECEPTIONS
named-query.description: Retrieves all reception records from database.
named-query.query: SELECT rec FROM Reception rec ORDER BY rec.rancherId

named-query.name: RECEPTIONS_BY_RANCHER_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves all reception records from database by rancher ID
named-query.query: SELECT rec FROM Reception rec WHERE rec.rancherId=:rancherID

named-query.name: CRT_RECEPTIONBARNYARD_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtReceptionBarnyard record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT RecepYard FROM ReceptionBarnyard RecepYard WHERE RecepYard.recBarnyardId = :recBarnyardId

named-query.name: RECEPTION_BARNYARD_BY_RECEPTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of barnyards for a given reception id
named-query.query: SELECT rec FROM ReceptionBarnyard rec WHERE rec.receptionId = :receptionId ORDER BY rec.barnyardId

named-query.name: RECEPTION_BARNYARD_BY_BARNYARD_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of receptions for a given barnyard_id
named-query.query: SELECT rec FROM ReceptionBarnyard rec WHERE rec.barnyardId = :barnyardId ORDER BY rec.receptionId

named-query.name: RECEPTION_BARNYARD_BY_BARNYARD_ID_AND_RECEPTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of receptions for a given barnyard_id and reception_id
named-query.query: SELECT rec FROM ReceptionBarnyard rec WHERE rec.barnyardId = :barnyard_id and rec.receptionId = :reception_id

named-query.name: CRT_RECEPTIONHEADCOUNT_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtReceptionHeadcount record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT RecepHcount FROM ReceptionHeadcount RecepHcount WHERE RecepHcount.headcountId = :headcountId

named-query.name: RECEPTION_HEADCOUNT_BY_RECEPTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of reception headcounts by ReceptionID
named-query.query: SELECT RecepHcount FROM ReceptionHeadcount RecepHcount WHERE RecepHcount.receptionId = :receptionId

named-query.name: CRT_FEEDORDER_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single Feed Order record by its ID
named-query.query: SELECT FeedOrd FROM FeedOrder FeedOrd WHERE FeedOrd.orderId = :orderId

named-query.name: FEEDORDER_BY_RECEPTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of feed orders using the reception id.
named-query.query: SELECT feed FROM FeedOrder feed WHERE feed.receptionId = :receptionId

named-query.name: CAT_FOOD_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtFood record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT fod FROM Food fod WHERE fod.foodId = :foodId

named-query.name: ALL_FOOD
named-query.description: Retrieves all records for food in database.
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM Food f ORDER BY f.foodName

named-query.name: CRT_FEEDORDERDETAILS_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtFood record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT FeOrDls FROM FeedOrderDetails FeOrDls WHERE FeOrDls.fodId = :fodId

named-query.name: FOD_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of feed order details based in the feed orderId
named-query.query: SELECT fod FROM FeedOrderDetails fod WHERE fod.orderId = :orderId ORDER BY fod.foodId

named-query.name: FEED_ORDER_DETAILS_BY_ORDER_ID_AND_FOOD_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list of feed order details based in the feed orderId and foodId
named-query.query: SELECT fod FROM FeedOrderDetails fod WHERE fod.orderId = :order_id and fod.foodId = :food_id

named-query.name: CRT_INSPECTION_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtFood record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT Insp FROM Inspection Insp WHERE Insp.inspectionId = :inspectionId

named-query.name: INSPECTION_BY_RECEPTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves all inspection records from a given reception
named-query.query: SELECT insp FROM Inspection insp WHERE insp.receptionId = :receptionId ORDER BY insp.inspectionDate desc

named-query.name: CRT_INSPECTIONBARNYARD_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtFood record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT InspBar FROM InspectionBarnyard InspBar WHERE InspBar.ibId = :ibId

named-query.name: IB_BY_INSPECTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves all barnyards for a given inspection id
named-query.query: SELECT ins FROM InspectionBarnyard ins WHERE ins.inspectionId = :inspectionId ORDER BY ins.barnyardId

named-query.name: CRT_INSPECTION_DETAILS_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single inspection details record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT InspDet FROM InspectionDetails InspDet WHERE InspDet.inspectionDetailsId = :inspDetId

named-query.name: INSPECTION_DETAILS_BY_INSPECTION_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves all inspection details for a given inspection id
named-query.query: SELECT ins FROM InspectionDetails ins WHERE ins.inspectionId = :inspId ORDER BY ins.inspectionCodeId

named-query.name: CAT_INSPECTIONCODE_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtFood record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT InspCod FROM InspectionCode InspCod WHERE InspCod.inspectionCodeId = :inspectionCodeId

named-query.name: ALL_INSPECTION_CODES
named-query.description: Retrieves all inspection codes from database
named-query.query: SELECT ic FROM InspectionCode ic ORDER BY ic.inspectionCodeDescription

named-query.name: CAT_FEEDORDERBARNYARD_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single crtFood record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT FedOrBar FROM FeedOrderBarnyard FedOrBar WHERE FedOrBar.feedOrdBarnId = :feedOrdBarnId

named-query.name: FEED_ORDER_FOR_BARNYARD_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a list with the feed orders for a given order
named-query.query: SELECT fob FROM FeedOrderBarnyard fob WHERE fob.orderId = :orderId

named-query.name: TODAY_INSPECTION_FORECAST
named-query.description: Retrieves a single record that represents todays forecast list
named-query.query: SELECT forecast FROM InspectionForecast forecast ORDER BY forecast.forecastDate

named-query.name: FORECAST_DETAIL_BY_FORECAST_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves all records from a given forecast id
named-query.query: SELECT forecastDetail FROM InspectionForecastDetail forecastDetail WHERE forecastDetail.forecastId = :forecastId

named-query.name: FORECAST_DETAIL_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single record of forecast details by its given id.
named-query.query: SELECT forecastDetail FROM InspectionForecastDetail forecastDetail WHERE forecastDetail.fdId = :fdId

named-query.name: FORECAST_BARNAYARD_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve a single record of forecast barnyard by its given id
named-query.query: SELECT forecastBarnyard FROM InspectionForecastBarnyard forecastBarnyard WHERE forecastBarnyard.ifbId = :ifbId

named-query.name: FORECAST_BARNYARD_BY_FORECAST_DETAIL_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve all barnyard records of a given forecast id
named-query.query: SELECT forecastBarnyard FROM InspectionForecastBarnyard forecastBarnyard WHERE forecastBarnyard.fdId = :fdId

named-query.name: RANCHER_USER_BY_RECORD_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve a single record of rancher user by its record id
named-query.query: SELECT rUser FROM RancherUser rUser WHERE rUser.recordId = :recordId

named-query.name: RANCHER_USER_BY_RANCHER_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves all users belonging to a given rancher id
named-query.query: SELECT rUser FROM RancherUser rUser WHERE rUser.rancherId = :rancherId

named-query.name: RANCHER_USER_BY_USER_NAME
named-query.description: Retrieves a single record of rancher user by its user id
named-query.query: SELECT rUser FROM RancherUser rUser WHERE rUser.user_name = :userName

named-query.name: USER_BY_NAME
named-query.description: Retrieves a single record by the given user name
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName = :userName

named-query.name: ALL_NO_RANCHER_USERS
named-query.description: Retrieves all users not assiged to rancher group for administration purposes.
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT u FROM User u LEFT JOIN u.groups r WHERE NOT r.role_name = "rancher" OR r.role_name IS NULL
